name: 150 Years of the Odesa Illia Mechnikov National University
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the 150th Anniversary of one of the oldest educational establishments of Ukraine, which ranks high in the educational system formation, development of research and culture in Ukraine and has a strong international reputation.
averseDescription: Obverse: above there are the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine with the inscription УКРАЇНА (Ukraine) underneath; the conventionalized composition symbolizing science fields and an educational process; in the centre there is the face value 5/ГРИВЕНЬ (5/hryvnias) and the issue year 2015 (below).
reverseDescription: Reverse: against the dark background there is depicted Odesa Illia Mechnikov National University and along the coin circumference there is the inscription ОДЕСЬКИЙ НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ УНІВЕРСИТЕТ ІМЕНІ І. І. МЕЧНИКОВА (Odesa Illia Mechnikov National University), below against the relief background there is inscribed 1865, the year of the establishment of the university.
